data.content: Section 148 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) 2023 pertains to the conspiracy to commit offences punishable under Section 147. It is classified as a cognizable offence and is punishable with imprisonment that may extend to seven years, along with a fine.
tell me the relevant section for this: Receiving property taken by war or depredation

The relevant section for "Receiving property taken by war or depredation" is Section 154 of the Bharatiya Nyaya Sanhita (BNS) 2023. This section classifies the offence as cognizable and states that it is punishable with imprisonment for a term that may extend to seven years, along with a fine and forfeiture of certain property acquired by such depredation.
